Growth in global aquaculture production from 2009 to 2019
- FAO

Of all seafood will come from aquaculture by 2030
- Seafish

settings.text:
Operating a number of thriving aquaculture businesses at a global scale, Sustainable Food Enterprises is on a mission to support the aquaculture sector through cutting-edge research and development.

Supported by over a decade of R&D history and underpinned by the knowledge of our industry-leading aquaculture team, Sustainable Food Enterprises has achieved numerous aquaculture breakthrough since inception, including the design and development of world-first aquaculture equipment and continuous success in drastically increasing shellfish survival rates within its worldwide farms and hatcheries.
